table_description: Kubernetes clusters in the Linode account.

columns.name: label
columns.description: This Kubernetes cluster’s unique label for display purposes only.

columns.name: created
columns.description: When this Kubernetes cluster was created.

columns.name: k8s_version
columns.description: The desired Kubernetes version for this Kubernetes cluster in the format of <major>.<minor>, and the latest supported patch version will be deployed.

columns.name: tags
columns.description: Tags applied to the Kubernetes cluster as a map.

columns.name: updated
columns.description: When this Kubernetes cluster was updated.
